content:
FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesTo Enum

Definition

Represents an enumeration that specifies the target directory that a FolderLevelBuildProvider object applies to.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public enum FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesTo
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesTo
Attributes
FlagsAttribute

Fields

Code

Specifies that a FolderLevelBuildProvider object applies to a folder that contains code.
GlobalResources

Specifies that a FolderLevelBuildProvider object applies to the global resources directory.
LocalResources

Specifies that a FolderLevelBuildProvider object applies to the local resources directory.
None

Specifies that a FolderLevelBuildProvider object does not apply to any directory.
WebReferences

Specifies that a FolderLevelBuildProvider object applies to the Web content directory.
